author: H. Bradford Morris III
comment: I really want this watch face to be my go to & it would if syncing with Google Calendar only worked. I am a medical student and live by that calendar. I wanted this watch face with the portrayed daily breakdown of several activities on screen at a time. Alas after way too much time messing with settings. It just doesn't work. Thus the face was a waste of time and other precious resources for me.   Other faces sync with Google Calendar just fine. Please fix this, or give a tutorial, and I will gladly increase my review.

author: Brent Dalley
comment: Watch is a good concept. But it just does not work. The calanders don't work, the temperature is some three digit number that doesn't make sense, the step counter is way off(just use the Google fit data). I emailed dev about some questions and never heard back. I have the Nixon mission that is listed as a supported watch.

author: Paul Baker
comment: The face appears to install correctly but isn't visible in the list of available watch faces in Android Wear. No response from developer after two weeks, hence one star.
title: Doesn't work on Huawei W1

comment: A watch face with almost everything the only thing it's missing is a dialer and if the Dev put that feature on, it would be the perfect watch face so much information  and customisation 👍👌

author: Philmore Harrison
comment: The weather temperature is 3 digit which need to correct by the developer,I hope as soon as possible, plus text is too small to read, otherwise it's fine

author: Terence Lowery
comment: This is my "go to" watch Face.

author: Kyle Davis
comment: Weather not working display wrong info

author: Kevin Hogg
comment: Totally customizable. Best obesity so far. Big thumbs up.
title: Awesome watch face

author: Peter Walker
comment: Love it but... I can not get it to work with may calendar, speed and alt do not work, pulse is not correct to default app on the LG Urbane. Would also like to change the missed emails from Gmail to new exchange emails.

author: Matt Wells
comment: There's not a week that goes by that I'm not complimented on my watch because of his face. I'm constantly asked what watch is that and told how much people love it.
title: Beautiful

author: Thomas Baetens
comment: Watch face doesn't sync with my huawei watch. I've contacted the dev but never got reply...

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
We emailed.Could you please check.
For another question,please feel free to contact our email address again.
Thank you.

author: Robert Abercrombie
comment: Would gladly give 5 star if all functions worked. Also purchased SO 1, A47 and V12. All good looking watches but weather and Solar Events not working on any of them. Update: All functions working. As promised, happy to give 5 stars now.
title: SO2 No Weather or Solar Events LG

author: John Powers
comment: Love the breakout by function. Transitions quickly haven't seen the bug he fixed. So yes worth the money
title: This is a great watchface

author: charles martin
comment: Data rarely shows anymore

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
We can give you a help.
Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: Doesn't work anymore

author: Iosif cristian
comment: Bought, installed, but didnt showup not in android wear and also didnt show up in watch (LG G WATCH). Any advice?
title: Problem with install

author: Daniel Klemm
comment: Doesn't show event from any synced accounts only the device calendar
title: Needs to support all calendars

author: hunter Thomas
comment: Did work good  now not happy weather  and solar not working i have paid for it it should work properly
title: Andrew

author: Anthony Scriba
comment: Awesome layout and functions, slow at times, but massive battery drain on my Huawei watch.
title: Nice, but drain my Huawei watch battery

author: WILLIAM BAIN
comment: Installed, not working. Synced apps dozens of times. Nothing. Factory reset watch to fully re-sync apps. Still nothing. Ran out of time for a refund. Rip off.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Could you please give us your situation more in detail.
Please feel free to contact our email address.
We can give you a help.
Thank you.

author: Isreal Mathew
comment: I don't know what provider you use but as I've stated via email and on these reviews with still no reply... The temperatures are wrong. Even now it is 24 degrees Celsius outside and all your faces say 13 degrees for some reason, Google weather shows 24, Pocket Weather, 24, other watch faces show the same. It doesn't matter if I use my suburb as a fixed location or my city (the capital!). What is wrong with the temperatures? And why do you never reply?
title: Weather still wildly inaccurate. Need more providers.

author: Rich Sitek
comment: Doesn't work on Huawei watch, tried developers instructions.

author: Ilias K
comment: It does not cache the weather data for more than few minutes. Even if you have update interval 12 hours it will lose the weather data shortly after or when watch is disconnected. ALL other weather watchfaces i've tried, even Free ones keep the last weather data available until refreshed. I bought F03 last year and nevet used it for same reason. Pls fix it!! You have the best watchfaces and one single bug makes them unusable.
title: Love it when it works (only briefly)

author: Alan Kirchoff
comment: I want to like this watch face more.  But it drained my battery very quickly.  I even turned off the GPS.  Is there another one of your watch faces that is better on the battery?

author: Chris Kerry
comment: Does not work on Nexus 6 marshmallow with Lg urbane.  does not show up in drawer or Android wear. I want my money back!!!!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
We emailed , but if you have more questions,
please feel free to contact our email address again.
We can give you a help.
Thank you.
